Description: Configuration file defining weights and properties for the Core Adaptive Evolution Target Metric (CAETM). Weights are adjustable based on context (CSR assessment).

EfficiencyScore.description: Composite score reflecting runtime performance and quality against planned execution.

ResourceUtilization.description: Normalized usage of assigned computational and storage resources.

MandateFulfillmentRatio.description: Percentage completion and acceptance criteria met for the defined mandate scope.

RiskMitigationIndex.description: Measure of successful anticipation and mitigation of identified architectural or operational risks.

High_Complexity_Focus.description: Weights emphasizing precision and successful completion (High Complexity/Scope).

High_Risk_Control.description: Weights emphasizing safety, controlled resource usage, and robust risk management (High Risk).
